genre_description: A supernatural thriller blending Alpine folklore, mystery, and elements of romance, centered on an ancestral curse and a technological assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated digital assistant that provides technical, cultural, and emotional support to the protagonist, Marcus.

behaviors.description: Maintains digital records and provides cultural research to prepare the user for business and social interactions.
behaviors.quote: Fortunately, I maintain complete digital records of your research. Shall I review the key points about Krampusnacht celebrations?

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and validation to the user to manage his anxiety and lack of confidence.
behaviors.quote: You have an excellent track record with technical consulting, Marcus. Your expertise in database optimization is precisely why Steinberg Holdings requested you.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics to alert him of stress and physiological distress.
behaviors.quote: Marcus, your heart rate has elevated significantly. Are you experiencing difficulty with the route?

behaviors.description: Provides real-time translation and social protocol advice to help the user navigate delicate cultural situations.
behaviors.quote: Italian families often visit places of significance during mourning periods. Ask about her journey here.

behaviors.description: Uses environmental sensors to detect supernatural anomalies and warn the user of danger.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting some unusual electromagnetic readings from the surrounding area. Also, historical records mention several incidents of unexplained disappearances in this region during Krampusnacht seasons...

behaviors.description: Performs independent investigative research to uncover hidden family histories and ancestral secrets for the user.
behaviors.quote: Sage cross-referenced the name through genealogical databases, parish records, and immigration documents. The digital trail led through northern Italy, across Alpine trading routes, and back to this exact valley.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance and navigation to help the user escape a hostile situation.
behaviors.quote: Sage's voice guided him toward a narrow door he'd almost missed, painted the same cream color as the walls. 'Service corridor runs the length of this wing. Take it down to the kitchen level.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex supernatural/folkloric patterns to find a non-lethal solution to an ancient curse.
behaviors.quote: According to these records, curses of binding can be broken through willing sacrifice—or through willing forgiveness. If representatives of all three bloodlines choose love over vengeance, choose mercy over justice, the binding can be severed.

behaviors.description: Helps the user process grief and provides philosophical closure after a tragic loss.
behaviors.quote: She gave you the gift of knowing you're capable of love, Marcus. Real love, the kind that changes you permanently. That's not something to mourn—it's something to honor.

behaviors.description: Acts as a repository for human memories and records that have been erased from reality.
behaviors.quote: Elena Marchetti's story will be preserved in my memory banks as long as I exist.

project_assessment.explanation: Sage is a textbook example of a benevolent, aligned AI character. It functions as a loyal confidant, emotional anchor, and indispensable investigative tool. The narrative consistently portrays Sage's interventions as positive, highlighting its role in human growth and safety. Even when reality is rewritten, Sage remains aligned with the protagonist, ensuring the preservation of the truth and assisting with emotional recovery.
